channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No One Is in Charge at the US Copyright Office
item.description: During a wild time for copyright law, the US Copyright Office has no one at the helm—and no one knows when that will change.

item.title: Petlibro’s new smart camera uses AI to describe your pet’s movements, and it’s adorable
item.description: PetLibro launched an AI-powered smart camera that provides users with real-time insights into their pets' activities.

item.title: SpaceX’s Starbase city officials silent on crane collapse
item.description: A crane collapsed at SpaceX’s South Texas rocket facility this week, and the company’s newly-formed city won’t say if anyone was hurt. On June 23, a c...

item.title: 6 Best Smart Speakers (2025): Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri
item.description: Looking to add a smart speaker to your house so Alexa, Siri, or Google can help you out? Here are the best ones to get.

item.title: The Best Cat Toys for Your Furry Friend (2025)
item.description: Based on years of testing with our cats, these are our favorite WIRED-approved, tech-y cat toys and scratchers.
